text: Allow me to begin with a shared story, one that resonates with many like myself.
We are often turned away at hospital entrances, our identity is denied at registration counters,
subjected to humiliated waiting areas and face testament and discrimination,
even being denied basic facilities like restrooms and wards.
Amidst it all, our unique bodies and needs are rarely understood by healthcare providers.
Hello everyone, I extend my warm greetings. I am Lakshya Aruga, identifying as a genderqueer individual.
Alongside me stands Sada Khan, my co-founder, a transgender, hijra woman from the Rajivam gharana of Mumbai.
of Mumbai. Together we present to you AliveHeart, a venture inspired by our own lived experiences.
AliveHeart is a pioneering digital health platform led by and dedicated to the LGBTQIA community.
Our comprehensive and inclusive healthcare services address the unique needs of this
vibrant community, offering specialized daily health consultations, mental health support,
gender empowerment care and a wealth of educational resources.
With a commitment to empathy and empowerment for the community,
AllyHeart aims to bridge the healthcare gap and provide a safe haven where individuals can thrive.
Join us in revolutionizing LGBTQIA-threatened healthcare and making a positive social impact.
